thread.title: Women who wore heirloom dresses for their weddings
thread.title_full: Women who wore heirloom dresses for their weddings

title: Women who wore heirloom dresses for their weddings
text: show ad And the bride wore... antique! Thrifty women opt for heirloom gowns passed down through the generations (and one has now been worn SIX times) More and more women are opting to wear their ancestors' bridal gowns instead of buying a new one Skye Haggard's 1940s dress had already been worn by five brides including her grandmother While the material for Lizzie Simmons' 1949 gown was paid for with rationing coupons
